original_text: And the children of Israel took their journeys out of the wilderness of Sinai; and the cloud rested in the wilderness of Paran.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 시내 광야에서 출발하여 자기 길을 가더니 바란 광야에 구름이 머무니라

sentences.original_text: And the children of Israel took their journeys
out of the wilderness of Sinai
